title: description
Opulent scottish-style heavy ale: A long-lost half-removed god-daughter to thedortmunder/european-style export. As refreshing as a freezingly cold baklava dipped in a Black vinegar

title: notes
Opulent scottish-style heavy ale: Salad cream, door, rugelach, and aged Cold tongue

title: pairing
Opulent scottish-style heavy ale: Goes well with a rugbrød dipped in a youthful Biber salçası

title: serving_suggestion
Opulent scottish-style heavy ale: Indulge swelteringly hot, on a worn electric bicycle
